name: Cardboard Humanity
description:
I'm not sure what to make of this one. Play AS the righteous hero on a grand quest. The movement is jank, attacking is jank, I think this is one of my truly low-effort games.

  • Code: Unity 2021.2.15f1
  • Dialogue system: Fungus Dialogue
  • Sound: 1BitDragon
  • Contributions from
    • MailmetotheMoon: Art
